body_html: @brge17 I believe this issue is fixed in the master branch. I manually modify model._make_test_function() to model._make_predict_function() under predict_generator() function in tensorflow/python/keras/engine/training_generator.py in the tensorflow 1.12.0 installation and it works fine. This also appeared in the master branch.

body: @brge17 I believe this issue is fixed in the master branch. I manually modify ``model._make_test_function()`` to ``model._make_predict_function()`` under ``predict_generator()`` function in ``tensorflow/python/keras/engine/training_generator.py`` in the tensorflow 1.12.0 installation and it works fine. This also appeared in the master branch.
